data.actual_result: Discord restarts, unable to change any voice or video settings
data.expected_result: Should not crash. Corner case with this legacy filter, but maybe triggered by other similar video filters as well?
data.short_description: Voice & video settings crash if a legacy IP Camera DirectShow filter installed
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a DS filter installed, found with webcamXP Free 5.9.8.7 <http://www.webcamxp.com/download.aspx> - Enter Discord Voice & video settings: crash - Entering settings with Ctrl+Win pressed: no crash (?) - Uninstall the previously mentioned software, enter settings: no crash
